history.proof: intros n. induction n as [| n' IHn]. - split; reflexivity. - destruct IHn as [H1 H2]. qsimpl use: opp_succZ,opp_predZ.

exceptions.tactic: split; [rewrite opp_succZ, H2| rewrite opp_predZ, H1]; reflexivity.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "oppZ (succZ ?M1397)" in the current goal.

original: intros n. induction n as [| n' IHn]. - split; reflexivity. - destruct IHn as [H1 H2]. split; [rewrite opp_succZ, H2| rewrite opp_predZ, H1]; reflexivity.
